preparation.raw_text:
1. Weigh out 80 g of Chromium(III) oxide, 40 g of Nickel(II) oxide, and 30 g of Zinc oxide using an accurate scale. 
 2. In a clean mixing container, combine the solid oxides. 
 3. Add 50 g of distilled water to the mixture slowly while stirring continuously to ensure even distribution. 
 4. Incorporate 10 g of binder into the mixture, stirring thoroughly until a homogeneous paste is formed.
